Capsule contains the tools you need to build a Solid Application.
More specifically, the SDK includes:
* Solid Client Libraries üóÇÔ∏è
* A JavaScript library for building user interfaces üíª
* Plug-ins üîå
* Code examples ü§ì
* Documentation üìö
